name.ja: <ruby>昆虫機甲鎧<rt>バイオインセクトアーマー</rt></ruby>

text.en: If this card is in your hand or GY and you do not control "Bio Insect Armor": You can target 1 Insect monster you control; equip this card to it, but banish this card and that equipped monster when they leave the field. You can only use this effect of "Bio Insect Armor" once per turn. A monster equipped with this card gains 1500 ATK/2000 DEF during the Battle Phase and Main Phase 2 only.
